# Q002 EU Member States
^question Q002
^type multiple_response
^identifier MR_Q001
^title EU Member States
^points 3
^labels #Geography #Europe #Understand #Medium

@field: question_text
Select all countries that are members of the European Union:
@end_field

@field: options
^Shuffle Yes
A. France
B. Germany
C. Norway
D. Italy
E. Switzerland
F. Spain
@end_field

@field: correct_answers
A, B, D, F
@end_field

@field: scoring
^Type PartialCredit
^Correct_selections A, B, D, F (1 point each)
^Incorrect_selections C, E (-0.5 points each)
^Points_minimum 0
@end_field

@field: feedback

@@field: general_feedback
France, Germany, Italy, and Spain are EU members. Norway and Switzerland are not.
@@end_field

@@field: correct_feedback
Correct! You identified all EU member states.
@@end_field

@@field: incorrect_feedback
Incorrect. Check which countries are EU members.
@@end_field

@@field: partial_feedback
Partially correct. Review the EU membership list.
@@end_field

@@field: unanswered_feedback
Please select at least one answer.
@@end_field

@end_field
